channel.title: Pair Programming on AI Freedom Stack
channel.description: Recent content in Pair Programming on AI Freedom Stack

item.title: GitHub Copilot
item.description:
What is GitHub Copilot?

An AI code completion tool by GitHub/Microsoft. It integrates into VS Code, JetBrains, and other editors to suggest code as you type — from single lines to entire functions. Copilot Chat adds conversational AI for explanations and debugging.

Who is it for?

  • Best for: Developers who want faster coding without switching editors
  • Not for: Non-coders (it assists, it doesn’t build for you) or people already using Cursor
  • Solo builder score: ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4/5)

What does it cost?

Plan Price What You Get
Free $0 Limited completions, limited chat
Individual $10/mo Unlimited completions + chat
Business $19/mo Team management, policy controls

Hidden costs: None really. Pricing is straightforward.

item.title: Windsurf
item.description:
What is Windsurf?

An AI-native code editor built by Codeium. Like Cursor, it’s a standalone editor with deep AI integration — codebase-aware chat, multi-file editing, and AI-guided “flows” that help you think through problems. The main pitch: similar power to Cursor, more accessible pricing.

Who is it for?

  • Best for: Solo developers who want AI coding assistance but find Cursor too expensive
  • Not for: People already happy with Cursor (switching cost isn’t worth the savings)
  • Solo builder score: ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4/5)

What does it cost?

Plan Price What You Get
Free $0 AI completions, limited premium features
Pro $15/mo Full AI features, priority models

Hidden costs: None significant.

item.title: Cursor
item.description:
What is Cursor?

Cursor is a code editor built on top of VS Code that puts AI at the center of your coding workflow. Instead of switching between your editor and ChatGPT, you talk to your codebase directly. Ask it to build features, fix bugs, or refactor — and it does it with full context of your project.

Who is it for?

  • Best for: Solo developers and non-technical founders building MVPs, web apps, or automations
  • Not for: Teams with strict code review processes who need predictable, auditable changes
  • Solo builder score: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)

What does it cost?

Plan Price What You Get
Free $0 50 slow AI requests/day, basic autocomplete
Pro $20/mo 500 fast requests/day, GPT-4 + Claude access
Business $40/mo Team features, admin controls

Hidden costs: The free tier is genuinely usable but you’ll hit the limit fast on a real project.
